name: Wind And Rain
description:
A small prototype I've made over the course of 1 week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

I wanted to improve this a lot more before publishing but I did not have much free time to work on it sadly. The core of the game is still there though and you should be able to get a good feel for the concept.

I also wanted to make a browser build for the game but was unable to due to the limitations of HDRP. I would have switched to another pipeline if I had known how many limitations it imposed on development.

How to play:

Avoid the rain by hiding under trees and bus stops OR by getting in trash bins or hiding in parked cars.

You must make it to your house dry and before 7PM or you will have lost the game.

Controls:

WASD to move and mouse to look around

Shift to sprint

E to interact with cars and trash bins

Assets Used:

Digital Clock Font - Coding4Web

All Sky Free - RpgWhiteLock

Ambient Sample Pack - Electrodynamics (depreciated)

Modular Abandoned Slaughterhouse - Mila Shalabai
